q: 2011 schwarze Zahlen geplant Die ehemalige Daimler-Tochter Chrysler schreibt weiterhin Verluste. Im vergangenen Jahr summierte sich das Minus auf unterm Strich 652 Millionen Dollar. But Bernie Sanders disagrees that the problem is urgent.`` This is not the most pressing problem,'' said Bernie Sanders , I-Vermont. Should we address the problem to make sure that it is there for our kids and our grandchildren? That Social Security is strong and secure for the next 75 years? Absolutely. Absolutely. But for people to come forward and say Social Security is collapsing, we've got to cut benefits tomorrow is totally untrue and we will not let it happen. Bernie Sanders has started a caucus of Senate members who oppose efforts to cut benefits, raise the retirement age or privatize Social Security.
